ResumeParserData.Experience: Product Manager	,Santander UK  Manchester, UK	,2018 - Present  At Santander UK, Thomas led the creation and launch of new financial products, boosting customer acquisition by 20%. His role involved close collaboration with marketing and IT teams.  Product Manager	,Nationwide Building Society  Manchester, UK	,2015 - 2018  Thomas managed a diverse product portfolio, driving a 15% increase in revenue. He utilized market analysis to inform strategic planning and product development.  Product Manager	,Halifax Bank  Manchester, UK	,2012 - 2015  At Halifax Bank, Thomas directed product lifecycle management, achieving a notable increase in market share. His efforts focused on customer feedback and market trends.  Product Manager	,NatWest Bank  Manchester, UK	,2009 - 2012  Thomas oversaw product development from ideation to launch, ensuring alignment with market needs. He engaged stakeholders to support successful product rollouts.  Product Manager	,Royal Bank of Scotland  Manchester, UK	,2006 - 2009  At RBS, Thomas managed product portfolios, driving innovation and customer satisfaction. His strategic initiatives led to significant business growth.  Product Manager	,Lloyds Bank  Manchester, UK	,2003 - 2006  Thomas's role at Lloyds involved leading product innovation and ensuring market fit. His collaborative approach resulted in improved product features and user experience.  Product Manager	,Barclays Bank  Manchester, UK	,2000 - 2003  Thomas directed product management initiatives, focusing on market competitiveness and customer-centric design. His strategic vision contributed to increased customer loyalty.  Various Roles in Product Management	,Various UK Banks  Manchester, UK	,1994 - 2000  Thomas gained extensive experience in product management through various roles, building a solid foundation in banking operations and product development.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Thomas Evans is an accomplished Product Manager with 30 years of experience in the banking sector. With a strong foundation in mathematics from a Russell Group university, he has led successful product development initiatives for several prominent UK banks. Thomas is skilled in strategic planning, market research, and customer satisfaction enhancement.

ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary:
Currently, Thomas holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Santander UK. from 01/01/2018 to 05/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 6.7 years in this company.

Thomas holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Nationwide Building Society. from 01/01/2015 to 31/12/2018. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Thomas holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Halifax Bank. from 01/01/2012 to 31/12/2015. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Thomas holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at NatWest Bank. from 01/01/2009 to 31/12/2012. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Thomas holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Royal Bank of Scotland. from 01/01/2006 to 31/12/2009. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Thomas holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Lloyds Bank. from 01/01/2003 to 31/12/2006. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Thomas holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Barclays Bank. from 01/01/2000 to 31/12/2003. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

ResumeParserData.DetailResume:
Thomas Evans
Address : 202 Willow Lane, Manchester, England
Email : thomas.evans@example.com
Phone : 07923 456789

Personal Statement
Thomas Evans is an accomplished Product Manager with 30 years of experience in the banking sector. With a strong foundation in mathematics from a Russell Group university, he has led successful product development initiatives for several prominent UK banks. Thomas is skilled in strategic planning, market research, and customer satisfaction enhancement.

Education History
University of Oxford (Russell Group) 
BSc Mathematics
Graduated : 1994

Work History
Product Manager	,Santander UK
Manchester, UK	,2018 - Present
At Santander UK, Thomas led the creation and launch of new financial products, boosting customer acquisition by 20%. His role involved close collaboration with marketing and IT teams.
Product Manager	,Nationwide Building Society
Manchester, UK	,2015 - 2018
Thomas managed a diverse product portfolio, driving a 15% increase in revenue. He utilized market analysis to inform strategic planning and product development.
Product Manager	,Halifax Bank
Manchester, UK	,2012 - 2015
At Halifax Bank, Thomas directed product lifecycle management, achieving a notable increase in market share. His efforts focused on customer feedback and market trends.
Product Manager	,NatWest Bank
Manchester, UK	,2009 - 2012
Thomas oversaw product development from ideation to launch, ensuring alignment with market needs. He engaged stakeholders to support successful product rollouts.
Product Manager	,Royal Bank of Scotland
Manchester, UK	,2006 - 2009
At RBS, Thomas managed product portfolios, driving innovation and customer satisfaction. His strategic initiatives led to significant business growth.
Product Manager	,Lloyds Bank
Manchester, UK	,2003 - 2006
Thomas's role at Lloyds involved leading product innovation and ensuring market fit. His collaborative approach resulted in improved product features and user experience.
Product Manager	,Barclays Bank
Manchester, UK	,2000 - 2003
Thomas directed product management initiatives, focusing on market competitiveness and customer-centric design. His strategic vision contributed to increased customer loyalty.
Various Roles in Product Management	,Various UK Banks
Manchester, UK	,1994 - 2000
Thomas gained extensive experience in product management through various roles, building a solid foundation in banking operations and product development.

Skills
Product Innovation
Market Research
Team Collaboration
Customer Experience Improvement
Strategic Execution

Qualifications
Certified Product Manager (CPM) 
PRINCE2 Practitioner
Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) 
Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO) 

Personal Hobbies
Photography : Enjoys capturing landscapes and urban scenes.
Cycling : Passionate about cycling and participating in local events.
Travel : Loves exploring new places and cultures.
Reading : Avid reader of fiction and financial literature.
Mentoring : Active mentor for young professionals in the banking industry.

AMS - Confidential

AMS - Confidential
  of NUMPAGES
ResumeParserData.HtmlResume:
Thomas Evans

Address: 202 Willow Lane, Manchester, England
Email: thomas.evans@example.com
Phone: 07923 456789

Personal Statement

Thomas Evans is an accomplished Product Manager with 30 years of experience in the banking sector. With a strong foundation in mathematics from a Russell Group university, he has led successful product development initiatives for several prominent UK banks. Thomas is skilled in strategic planning, market research, and customer satisfaction enhancement.

Education History

University of Oxford (Russell Group)

  • BSc Mathematics
  • Graduated: 1994

Work History

Product Manager | Santander UK
Manchester, UK | 2018 - Present
At Santander UK, Thomas led the creation and launch of new financial products, boosting customer acquisition by 20%. His role involved close collaboration with marketing and IT teams.

Product Manager | Nationwide Building Society
Manchester, UK | 2015 - 2018
Thomas managed a diverse product portfolio, driving a 15% increase in revenue. He utilized market analysis to inform strategic planning and product development.

Product Manager | Halifax Bank
Manchester, UK | 2012 - 2015
At Halifax Bank, Thomas directed product lifecycle management, achieving a notable increase in market share. His efforts focused on customer feedback and market trends.

Product Manager | NatWest Bank
Manchester, UK | 2009 - 2012
Thomas oversaw product development from ideation to launch, ensuring alignment with market needs. He engaged stakeholders to support successful product rollouts.

Product Manager | Royal Bank of Scotland
Manchester, UK | 2006 - 2009
At RBS, Thomas managed product portfolios, driving innovation and customer satisfaction. His strategic initiatives led to significant business growth.

Product Manager | Lloyds Bank
Manchester, UK | 2003 - 2006
Thomas's role at Lloyds involved leading product innovation and ensuring market fit. His collaborative approach resulted in improved product features and user experience.

Product Manager | Barclays Bank
Manchester, UK | 2000 - 2003
Thomas directed product management initiatives, focusing on market competitiveness and customer-centric design. His strategic vision contributed to increased customer loyalty.

Various Roles in Product Management | Various UK Banks
Manchester, UK | 1994 - 2000
Thomas gained extensive experience in product management through various roles, building a solid foundation in banking operations and product development.

Skills

  • Product Innovation
  • Market Research
  • Team Collaboration
  • Customer Experience Improvement
  • Strategic Execution

Qualifications

  • Certified Product Manager (CPM)
  • PRINCE2 Practitioner
  • Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP)
  • Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
  • Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO)

Personal Hobbies

  • Photography: Enjoys capturing landscapes and urban scenes.
  • Cycling: Passionate about cycling and participating in local events.
  • Travel: Loves exploring new places and cultures.
  • Reading: Avid reader of fiction and financial literature.
  • Mentoring: Active mentor for young professionals in the banking industry.
